perks.name: Neutralizer
perks.desc: Reduces damage taken from Poison damage types by 20%.

perks.name: Incalescent Armor
perks.desc: Reduces damage taken from Fire and Blast damage types by 20%.

perks.name: Powered Armor
perks.desc: Reduces damage taken from Energy damage type by 20%.

perks.name: Kinetic Absorption
perks.desc: Reduces damage taken from Bullet and Kinetic damage types by 20%.

perks.name: Sprinter
perks.desc: Increases sprint speed by an additional 5%.

perks.name: Prototype Pistons
perks.desc: Increases base movement speed by 0.5 m a second.

perks.name: Fast Hands
perks.desc: Increases reload speed by 10%.

perks.name: Resilient Plating
perks.desc: When below 25% health, the Dreadnaught automatically regenerates 1% of their max health per second.

perks.name: Get a Move On
perks.desc: Increases run speed by 15% when weapon is holstered.

perks.name: Knockout
perks.desc: Increases damage of melee attack by 20% and adds a chance to stun the target.

perks.name: Deflection Plating
perks.desc: Enemy bullets that hit you have a 33% chance to ricochet and damage a nearby enemy.

perks.name: Hellbent
perks.desc: Suffering damage causes your Battleframe offensive systems to go into overdrive, receiving a 5% damage increase every time your Battleframe is hit. This stacks up to 25% bonus damage and lasts 15 seconds.

perks.name: Nanite Absorption
perks.desc: Assault Exclusive Perk: gain 50% additional healing when picking up or using health packs.

perks.name: Quick-Flexing Servos
perks.desc: Increases jump height by 3m.

perks.name: Plasma Enthusiast
perks.desc: Energy and Plasma Weapons deal 10% additional damage.

perks.name: Invigorate
perks.desc: Activating an ability invigorates the user and their nearby allies; increasing movement and attack speed by 15%.

perks.name: Second Wind
perks.desc: Rapidly killing 5 or more enemies when health is critical (Below 30% health) heals the user for 60% of their max health.

perks.name: Siphoning Unit
perks.desc: Biotech Exclusive Perk: Siphoning Unit heals the user for 10% of any damage or healing they inflict. Does not work with damage inflicted by healing abilities.

perks.name: Persistence
perks.desc: Increases health regeneration.

perks.name: Bio Blending
perks.desc: Increases damage dealt while at full health by 10%.

perks.name: Catalytic Poisons
perks.desc: Targets hit with poison abilities have additional damage dealt as a delayed poison burst several seconds after being infected. Targets hit with poison damage take additional damage equal to 2.5x your power rating after every 3 seconds.

perks.name: Toxic Finale
perks.desc: Detonate a powerful poison bomb when incapacitated.
